content: Hi Adam…I’ve just read your post and found it inspirational. I also read your backstory about Pennybox. I work with startups and small businesses, in the UK and Europe to help accelerate success. I’d love to use both articles as the main subject in one of my weekly newsletters. Would you be prepared to add a personal note to the newsletter? Just a few words? I do hope so because your stories are so good they’re worth sharing :)
